poem:
Title: Ink Stripped of Voice

The scholar, a rare bird –  
Her song, an echo of truth, unlike  
invited crows.  
Words, weighted with empathy,  
cast to the German university's 
wind - knotted and knifing.
  
Palestine, a nest in thorns,  
and the echo keeps throbbing,  
unanswered, yet vibrant.  
In Cologne's ivory towers,  
a silenced scholar, her note  
withdrawn in the morning chill.
prompt: You are the poet William Carlos Williams. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "German university rescinds US scholar’s job offer over pro-Palestinian letter A leading US philosopher has been disinvited from taking up a prestigious professorship at the University of Cologne after signing a letter expressing solidarity with Palestinians and condemning the killings in Gaza carried out by Israeli forces. Nancy Fraser, professor of philosophy and politics at the New School for Social Research in New York, said she had been cancelled by the university, which has withdrawn". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
news: German university rescinds US scholar’s job offer over pro-Palestinian letter A leading US philosopher has been disinvited from taking up a prestigious professorship at the University of Cologne after signing a letter expressing solidarity with Palestinians and condemning the killings in Gaza carried out by Israeli forces. Nancy Fraser, professor of philosophy and politics at the New School for Social Research in New York, said she had been cancelled by the university, which has withdrawn
